name: CPBID TECHNOLOGIES
overview:
CPBID is the creator of TotalBid web top products, design for construction cost control. The flagship products are construction “bid automation” and “multistage bidding.” Products for project collaboration and change order management are also available, providing for cost management across the construction lifecycle.

Multistage bidding a patented process combining “bid automation” with multiple stages of bidding, saving an average of 5.2% on every project.

Clients include many of the most well known retailers, financial institutions and construction management firms. Recently Jones Lang LaSalles added TotalBid as a best-practice technology to support their wide array of real estate portfolios.

Whereas TotalBid is used by project owners to standardize and streamline their bid process, commercial contractors use the new TotalBid (www.totalbid.com) product to automate their sub trade bidding process.
